biography.title: Biography
biography.content: Hello, I’m Evren Yeniev — a Fullstack .NET Developer based in Germany. My journey started in system and network administration, where I built a strong foundation in IT infrastructure. Over time, my curiosity for coding led me to shift into software development. For the past several years, I’ve been designing and developing web and mobile solutions that help businesses work smarter. I enjoy transforming ideas into digital products using technologies like C#, .NET Core, and Vue.js — always focusing on clean, maintainable code and great user experience.

meta.title: Works
meta.description: Explore a selection of projects I’ve built as a Fullstack .NET Developer — from e-learning platforms to sports club management systems. Each project reflects my focus on clean architecture, scalability, and a seamless user experience.
meta.keywords: Evren Yeniev, .NET developer, Vue.js, software projects, web development, fullstack developer, portfolio, clean architecture, digital solutions

goztepe.title: Göztepe Sports Club
goztepe.description: Developed the official website and backend system for Göztepe Sports Club — a dynamic platform that connects all sports departments under one digital roof. Built with .NET Core, Vue.js, and Docker, it enables real-time content management, match tracking, and interactive fan engagement tools.

onarim.title: Onarim GmbH
onarim.description: Designed and implemented a bilingual, fully responsive corporate website for Onarim GmbH. Using .NET Core, Vue.js, and SASS, I delivered a clean and modern web presence that supports both German and Turkish audiences effortlessly across all devices.

turmepa.title: Turmepa Web Akademi
turmepa.description: Built an educational web platform for TURMEPA — a non-profit focused on marine conservation and sustainability. The site provides secure document access, video integration, and a simple admin dashboard, combining accessibility with environmental impact.

thenbaexhibition.title: The NBA Exhibition
thenbaexhibition.description: Transformed the complete Figma design of The NBA Exhibition into a fast, interactive single-page site. Developed with JavaScript and SASS, it captures the energy of the NBA’s culture and history through smooth visuals and an engaging user flow.

pdtacademy.title: PDT Gabelstapler Academy
pdtacademy.description: Developed an interactive e-learning platform for forklift certification. The system features online exams, secure payments, and course tracking — all powered by .NET, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL, providing a complete digital training solution.

helpdunya.title: Help Dunya
helpdunya.description: Automated complex project-tracking workflows for a German non-profit using Power Automate and .NET. The solution reduced manual data entry and eliminated redundant tasks, saving hundreds of hours annually.
